title: Vaada Vaa Machi Lyrics Demonte Colony
stanzas:
Vaada vaa machi
namma life eh
oru vaththi kuchi
namathuthaan pona
pathathe adha
eriya vachi (2)

thimiraga poda ponale
nee jeyikkum katchi.
dealathaan podu
nee maanja potta kaathadi

vaa da nee podu da
pala scene-a podu da.
un feel-u gaandellam
nee thoora poduda.

poda indha life-u thaan
pudhu cooling beer-u da.
speed-ah adhu pongura
norayaa paaruda.

un nenjum onnu sollum da
adha ketta nee pova munnala.    
unakedhum oru kastam na
nanben naan nippen un pinnala.

sondhamlam adhu
kuppathu koli pol
era potta vandhu koththikkum

friendship eh dhenam
unakaaga pathikkum
kai korthu ada
po po munna po

vaa da nee podu da
pala scene ah podu da
un feel-u gaandellam
thoora poduda

poda indha life-u thaan
idhu cooling beer-u da
speed-ah adhu pongura
maya paaruda

money koondil
ulla mani paarthu
ada mallandhu
nee kedakkadha.

un time-um
ippo start aagum
hey un geththa
nee ezhakadha.

avan jeipan ada ivan
kooda jeipan da.
adhanaala feel pannadha

nee jeicha avanum
annaarndhu paappaan da
dhillaaga nee
 po po munna po

Vaada vaa machi
namma life eh
oru vaththi kuchi
namathuthaan pona
pathathe adha
eriya vachi (2)

thimiraga poda ponale
nee jeyikkum katchi.
dealathaan podu
nee maanja potta kaathadi

[vaa da nee podu da
pala scene-a podu da.
un feel-u gaandellam
nee thoora poduda.

poda indha life-u thaan
pudhu cooling beer-u da.
speed-ah adhu pongura
norayaa paaruda.](2)
